description: This is a Java configuration class for Spring Boot that sets up and manages a Neo4j database driver. It reads configuration properties for connection details, creates a singleton Driver instance for database interaction, and ensures proper cleanup during shutdown.

classes.name: Neo4jConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class that provides a Neo4j Driver bean and manages its lifecycle.

methods.name: neo4jDriver
methods.description: Creates and provides the Neo4j Driver object configured with connection details from application properties.

methods.name: closeDriver
methods.description: Gracefully closes the Neo4j Driver upon application shutdown.
